article_title: Are High Phone Bills Cruel and Unusual Punishment? The FCC Thinks so, and Plans to Mandate Lower Rates for Convicts.
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: A decision is being made by the unelected members of the FCC, an agency with no expertise – or accountability – for prison management.
